analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/38/0x33fcaf980028cd42f9ca3675645d42db8aa4065b.sol:
	Contract Jerome has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/38/0x33fcaf980028cd42f9ca3675645d42db8aa4065b.sol#199)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/38/0x33fcaf980028cd42f9ca3675645d42db8aa4065b.sol#86) is not in mixedCase
